question: The first US-Asean Maritime Exercise (AUMX) has officially started from  which country?
explanation: In Thailand, the first  US-Asean Maritime Exercise (AUMX)  officially started at the Royal Thai Fleet headquarters at Chon Buri\'s Sattahip district. The aim of the 5-day AUMX is to train the regional navies in delivering humanitarian assistance and mitigating disasters. The exercise provides a new multilateral venue to work together on shared maritime security priorities in the region. The joint exercise will involve 1,250 military personnel. The AUMX is co-led by the US and the Royal Thai Navy and will be preceded with pre-sail activities in Thailand, Singapore and Brunei, followed by sea drills in international waters in the Gulf of Thailand as well as the South China Sea. The exercise will conclude in Singapore.
